Jovelyn is a 45-year-old married woman with three children, two of whom are presently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Jovelyn has a vulcanizing shop business in the Philippines. Jovelyn requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy materials like tire, oils, gasoline, spare parts, and maintenance for her business.

Jovelyn has been in this business for ten years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials like tire, oils, gasoline, spare parts, and maintenance for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase supplies to make rolls for sale, such as: corn flour, starch, cheese, eggs and others.

loans.name: Laguna Kapi.i Group

texts.es:
Este es un grupo nuevo, formado en la ciudad de Itá, ellas son mujeres muy unidas que quieren mejorar sus condiciones de vida, y la de sus seres queridos por medio de sus esfuerzos.  15 son las mujeres que integran este grupo, todas ellas amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad.
Karen es una humilde vendedora de remedios naturales, comenta que tiene muy buena clientela que siempre compra de ella los remedios que vende, y que gracias a ello ya es muy conocida en la zona. Karen se esfuerza para poder mejorar su pequeño emprendimiento a través del trabajo en equipo de todas.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de remedios naturales para la venta, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar cada día.
texts.en:
This is a new group. It formed in Itá city. They are very tightly knit women who want to improve their living conditions, and that of their loved ones, through their efforts. The women who make up this group total 15, all are friends and neighbors in that city.

Karen is a humble seller of natural remedies. She says that she has very good customers who always buy her remedies, and thanks to this, she is already very well known in the area. Karen strives to improve her small enterprise through the teamwork of all.

She asks for this loan in order to be able to invest it in the purchase of natural remedies for sale, and in this way to be able to continue with her sales as she has been doing. Thanks for the opportunity that she receives to be able to improve each day.

loans.use: to purchase natural remedies for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy sweets, cookies, juices etc. to stock the kiosk.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
Nilda es una persona que se esfuerza por poder cumplir sus sueños de ser una profesional útil, no solo a si mismo, sino también a los demás, comenta que su anterior préstamo lo uso en poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, lo cual le fue muy útil.
Hoy pide de vuelta este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y así seguir con sus estudios para cumplir sus metas y anhelos.
texts.en: Nilda is a  person that works hard to achieve her dreams to be in a profession that is helpful not only to herself, but also to others. She says that she used her previous loan to pay for university fees, which was very useful. Today she asks again for this loan to be able to pay for university fees for her major, and this way continue with her studies to be able to achieve her goals and desires.

loans.use: to pay for university fees.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis está siguiendo la carrera de contabilidad y para poder cubrir sus gastos también está trabajando, vive con sus abuelos quienes son su mayor inspiración de lucha.
Su meta es terminar su carrera y así obtener su título y a la vez poder ascender en su trabajo.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma luchar por sus metas.
texts.en:
Luis is majoring in accounting. He works to cover his costs, and lives with his grandparents, who are his greatest inspiration for his struggle.

His goal is to finish his studies and get his degree, and also to rise in his work.

He is seeking this loan to be able to invest it in his tuition, and thus fight to reach his goals.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es estudiante de la carrera de derecho, ella se esta esforzando por poder cumplir sus metas de ser un profesional util, no solo para si misma, sino también para los demás. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera.
Ella pide este nuevo préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Maria is a student studying law. She is working to be able to achieve her goal of being a professional who is useful to not only herself but also to others. She says that she used her previous loan to be able to pay the fees for her schooling. 

She is again requesting a loan to be able to invest it to pay for her education, and in this way to be able to continue her studies.

loans.use: to pay for university fees

loans.name: Cristian

texts.es:
El Joven Cristian es de la ciudad de Curuguaty, quien estudia y trabaja al mismo tiempo, está cursando el segundo año   de la carrera de Agronomía. 
Él es una persona que se esfuerza para poder ser alguien en la vida, y de esa forma también poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar los trabajos de su universidad, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: Young Cristian is from the city of Curuguaty, and goes to school and works at the same time. He is studying in his second year of Agricultural Science. He is a person making an effort to be someone in life, and in this way to also be able to help his family. He is requesting this loan to be able to pay for his university fees, and in this manner continue his studies as he has been doing.

loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
Celia proviene de una familia humilde y trabajadora, está al cuidado de su madre, estudia la licenciatura en ciencias de la educación, y comenta que su inspiración es su madre que ya es de edad avanzada.
Aspira a lograr más cargos en el ejercicio de su profesión y así poder aumentar sus ingresos y ser útil a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y así seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en: Celia comes from a hardworking and humble family. She takes care of her mother and is studying for her Bachelor's degree in sciences education. She says that her inspiration is her mother, who is elderly. She aspires to achieve more in practicing her profession and in this way be able to increase her earnings and be useful to her family. She requests this loan to be able to pay for university fees and thereby continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay for university fees.

loans.name: Badedele

texts.fr: Badedele est une femme mariée de 48 ans qui vit à Tokoin. Mère d’un enfant, Badedele est une revendeuse des tubercules d’ignames et des objets ménagés. Badedele s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché et le revend à la devanture de son domicile pour atteindre ses objectifs. Pour commander des calebasses d’ignames et des unités de sceaux en plastiques, Badedele nécessite ce fonds pour financer son approvisionnement en vue de bien vendre et réaliser une bonne marge bénéficiaire afin de pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de son enfant en lui payant ses frais scolaire dès cette rentrée.
texts.en:
Badedele is a married woman of 48 who lives in Tokoin. The mother of one child, Badedele sells yams and household items. She stocks up once a month at the market and sells her goods in front of her house so as to attain her objectives.

To order some gourdfuls of yams and some plastic buckets, Badedele needs these funds to cover the cost of replenishing her inventory. She wants to make her sales at a good profit margin so that she can cover the needs of her child by paying school fees as soon as school begins.

loans.use: to buy six gourdfuls of yams and 20 plastic buckets.

loans.name: Mujeres Al Poder Group

texts.es:
El Comité se llama Mujeres al Poder, ya que ellas decidieron tomar el poder en sus manos para poder ayudar a sus familias por medio del trabajo unido de todas. Cada una pone su mayor esfuerzo para poder crecer y ayudar a sus seres queridos.
Exi es una de las personas que integra este grupo, se dedica a las costuras, ella es una persona muy sacrificada que lucha por su familia, para poder darles una mejor calidad de vida. Exi se unió a este grupo para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida, a través de las capacitaciones que es va dando la fundación paraguaya.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar telas, hilos, gomas, botones y otros, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus confecciones como lo vine haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar cada día.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called Mujeres al Poder (Women in Power) since they have decided to take the power into their own hands in order to help their families through the work that unites them. Each of them puts forth their best effort in order to grow and help their loved ones.

Exi is one of the members of this group who works as a seamstress. She is a very generous person who fights for her family in order to give them a better quality of life. Exi became part of this group in order to improve her family's living conditions through the trainings that she receives from Fundacion Paraguaya.

She is asking for this loan in order to purchase fabric, thread, elastic, buttons and other materials and in this way, be able to continue making garments as she has been doing. She is thankful for the opportunity that she has to be able to improve each day.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, elastic, buttons, and other items to use in garment making.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Victor es de la ciudad de Paraguarí, se encuentra cursando el cuarto año de la carrera de ingeniería Agronóma, estudia esta carrera para que algún día pueda ocupar cargos importantes y de esa manera poder brindarle a su familia una vida mejor.
Su meta futura es graduarse y de esa manera aportar sus conocimientos a la institución donde el trabaja.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Victor is from the city of Paraguarí. He is studying in his fourth year of Agricultural Engineering. He is studying this field to some day be able to occupy important positions and in this way provide a better life for his family. 

His goal for the future is to graduate and in this manner contribute his knowledge in the institution in which he works. He requests this loan to invest it to pay for his university fees, and in thus be able to continue with his studies.

loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Erick Jesus

texts.es:
Erick, de 26 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañado y vive con su pareja, sus hermanos y su cuñado que trabaja como motorista. 

Erick, tiene una pequeña tienda desde hace un mes, hace varios años la tienda era de su madre pero cuando su madre ya no pudo administrarla, él decidió restablecerla en su casa y atiende todos los días desde las 6:00 de la mañana hasta las 6:00 de la tarde.

Erick, necesita el préstamo es para comprar mercadería para la tienda, esto le permitiría tener más clientes por lo tanto mejorar las ganancias. 

El sueño principal de Erick, es que su tienda sea la preferida por los vecinos y también desea ver crecer a su pequeño hijo y brindarle la educación necesaria para que se forme como profesional.
texts.en:
Erick, 26 years old, went to school up to the ninth grade, is partnered, and lives with his partner, his siblings, and his brother-in-law who works as a driver.

Erick has had a small store for a month. For some years, the store was his mother's but when his mother couldn't run it anymore, he decided to re-establish it in his house and he tends it every day from 6:00 in the morning to 6:00 in the evening.

Erick needs the loan to purchase merchandise for the store, this would allow him to have more customers as well as improve the earnings.

Erick's primary dream is that his store be the preferred one for his neighbors and he also wants to see his young son grow and offer him the needed education so that he becomes a professional.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Josue Neftali

texts.es:
Josué, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casado y vive con su esposa, sus suegros y su pequeño hijo el cual estudia kinder, su esposa trabaja en los oficios domésticos.

Josué, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años, fue su padre que desde muy pequeño le enseño esta labor; pero aparte de eso trabaja vendiendo carne, el lugar donde siembra está ubicado a 1 kilometro de distancia desde su casa.

Josué, necesita el préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas para sus cultivos de maíz como abono e insecticidas, esto hará que sus cultivos den una buena cosecha.

El sueño de Josué, es obtener buenas cosechas y también sueña con tener su segundo hijo y que sea una niña.
texts.en:
Josué went to school up to the ninth grade, is married and lives with his wife, his in-laws and his little son who is in kindergarten. His wife takes care of the household duties.

Josué has worked in agriculture for 10 years, it was his father who since he was very young taught him this work. But, apart from this he also works selling meat. The place where he plants is located 1 kilometer away from his house.

Josué needs the loan to purchase agricultural supplies for his corn crop such as manure and insecticides. This will make his crop give a good harvest.

Josué's dream is to get a good harvest and he also dreams of having a second child and that it would be a girl.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies for his corn crop such as manure and insecticides.

loans.name: Ama

texts.fr: Ama est une femme mariée âgée de 44 ans qui habite à Tokoin. Mère de cinq enfants, Ama est une marchande de pains. Ama s’approvisionne cinq fois par mois au marché et le revend au bord de la route non loin de son domicile pour gagner son revenu. Pour commander des dizaines de pains, Ama nécessite ce fonds pour financer son approvisionnement en vue de bien vendre et réaliser une bonne marge bénéficiaire afin de pouvoir aider son mari à subvenir aux besoins de la famille.
texts.en:
Ama is a married woman aged 44 who lives in Tokoin. The mother of five children, Ama sells loaves of bread. She stocks up five times a month at the market and sells her bread along the road not far from her home so as to earn a living.


To be able to order several dozen loaves of bread, Ama needs funds to cover her purchase. She wants to make a lot of sales and have a good profit margin so as to be able to help her husband to cover the needs of the family.

loans.use: to buy 30 dozen loaves of bread.

loans.name: Luciernagas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LUCIERNAGAS” iniciará el sexto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Copacabana, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Fanny es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de ropa, venta de mantas, venta de jugo de quinua, venta de carne, tienda de barrio.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Fanny es integrante, ella indica que integra Pro Mujer por la invitación de una promoción de la institución en la zona donde vive. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio hace varios años por iniciativa propia. 

El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Luciernagas” (Fireflies) is starting its sixth loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Copacabana Community Center. This group consists of eight members and is led by a Board of Directors in which Sra. Fany serves as its president. The members of this Communal Bank engage in various busiensses such as selling clothes, selling blankets, selling quinoa juice, selling meat, and managing a neighborhood store.

This loan will be benefit small entrepreneurs such as Sra. Fany. She says that she joined Pro Mujer after receiving an invitation to a promotional event in the area where she lives that was sponsored by the organization. Fany currently has a business of selling clothes. She has become knowledgeable about this business having started it several years ago on her own.

The loan she is receiving now will be used to increase her capital for buying clothes in bulk. She acquires her merchandise from sellers in the city of La Paz and offers them for sale from her own retail space. Working in this manner enables her to generate income that is needed to support her family financially. Fany is single and has one child.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Fany said that she enjoys the health services offered by the organization.

loans.use: to buy clothes in bulk to sell.

loans.name: Sonia Yanira

texts.es:
Sonia, de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta séptimo grado, debido a la pobreza en la que creció para sus padres era imposible poder apoyarla para que continuar sus estudios, fue por esa razón que tuvo que dejar la escuela a temprana edad, para dedicarse a trabajar.- Es madre soltera, vive con su madre, se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene dos hijos pequeños que asisten a la escuela y es por quienes tiene que buscar la manera de obtener ingresos para que sus hijos lleguen al menos hasta bachillerato.
	
Sonia, con mucho esfuerzo ha buscado los medios, para sacar a sus hijos adelante y ella manifiesta que no ha sido sencillo, a tenido que pasar momentos muy difíciles, hace cuatro años inicio a vender tortillas a sus vecinos; con el apoyo de su madre ha logrado colocar su negocio de tortillas y lo atiende de lunes a sábado de 7:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m.

Sonia, necesita el préstamo para comprar una plancha nueva, mejorar su galera y comprar quintales de maíz para tenerlos almacenados, porque debido a la sequía que afectó al país, el grano del maíz subió de precio y eso dificultara poder adquirirlo y también implicaría menos rentabilidad en su negocio, limitando así sus ingresos familiares y por ende sus condiciones de vida. 

Sonia, en el corto plazo desea mejorar su galera para que se vea más atractiva y más segura, para que en época lluviosa no se moje.
texts.en:
Sonia, 28 years old, went to school up to the seventh grade. Due to the poverty in which she was raised, it was impossible for her parents to be able to support her to continue her education. For this reason, she had to drop out of school at a young age, to dedicate herself to working. She is a single mother, lives with her mother, takes care of the household tasks, has two young children who go to school, and for them she has to look for a way of getting income so her children manage to complete at least secondary school.

Sonia, with a lot of effort, has sought the means to get her children ahead and she says that is has not been easy; she has had to go through very difficult times. Four years ago, she began to sell tortillas to her neighbors. With her mother's support, she has managed to establish her tortilla business and she tends it from Monday to Saturday from 7:00 am to 4:00 pm.

Sonia needs the loan to purchase a new griddle, improve her shelter and purchase quintals of corn to have them stored because, due to the drought that affected the country, corn has risen in price and this will make it difficult to be able to acquire it and also will mean less profitability in her business, limiting her family income and, in the end, her living conditions.

Sonia, in the short term, wants to improve her shelter so that it is more attractive and secure, so that in the rainy season she doesn't get wet.

loans.use: to purchase a new griddle, improve her shelter and purchase quintals of corn.

loans.name: Grupo Mujeres De Tonquin 1 San Vicente Group

texts.es:
Rosario es una mujer muy trabajadora, con grandes aspiraciones en la vida tiene 27 años y vive junto a su familia en una comunidad de San Antonio.
Rosario (se ubica en medio de las tres) su gran satisfacción es haber obtenido con la inversión que realizo una buena superación, pues a Dios gracias logro ampliar su negocio de tortillería y sus ganancias mejoraron. Ella nuevamente solicita un préstamo que en esta ocasión lo invertirá en su negocio de crianza de pollos y elaboración de queso. Con este anagrama Rosario espera poder satisfacer mejor a sus clientes quienes le compran pollos y queso.
Su gran sueño es que su negocio de crianza de pollo y su venta de queso crezca para mejor estabilidad.
texts.en:
Rosario is a very hard-working woman with great plans for her life. She is 27 years old and lives with her family in a community in San Antonio.

Rosario (the one in middle of the three women) is very happy to have been able to make great improvements with the previous investment. She was able to expand her tortilla business and her earnings improved. She is applying for another loan, which she will use in her business to raise chickens and produce cheese. With this loan, Rosario hopes to see a higher level of satisfaction in the customers that buy chickens and cheese from her.

Her great dream is for her business of raising chickens and selling cheese to grow in order to improve stability.

loans.use: to raise chickens and produce cheese.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.fr:
40 ans, mariée, Lydia est mère de trois enfants de 8, 14, et 18 ans. Ces derniers sont tous scolarisés dans une école chrétienne privée. 
L'époux de Lydia est gardien et son salaire est très faible c'est pourquoi elle s'efforce d'exercer deux activités différentes pour augmenter le revenu familial. Elle confectionne des paniers en raphia depuis long temps d'une part et dirige un magasin général de l'autre. Elle commençait cette deuxième activité en 1999 et c'est devenu son principal activité. Son souhait est de développer et améliorer le magasin, pour qu'elle puisse continuer à financer les études de ses enfants, elle est à son 3ème prêt auprès de CEFOR.
C'est une femme courageuse et travailleuse.
texts.en:
Lydia, 40 years old and married, is the mother of three children aged 8, 14, and 18. They are all enrolled in a private Christian school.

Lydia's husband is a guard and his salary is very low; that is why she works hard to run two different activities to supplement the family income. On the one hand, she has been weaving raffia baskets for a long time, and at the same time, she runs a little general store. She began the second business in 1999 and it has become her principal activity. Her wish is to develop and improve the store so that she can continue to afford to send her children to school.

Lydia is on her third loan with CEFOR. She is a courageous and hard-working woman.

loans.use: to buy some sacks of rice, containers of edible oil, cartons of soap, and sacks of dried peas and beans.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
El comité denominado  San Cayetano se encuentran en su ciclo número 6, es un grupo muy numeroso, donde todas se unieron para poder mejorar sus vidas, a través de las capacitaciones que van recibiendo dentro del programa que ofrece la fundación paraguaya.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Rosa, ella es empleada y también se dedica a la venta de productos de limpieza que ella misma hace. Pide este préstamo para poder comprar el kit de limpieza de las microfranquicias que ofrece la fundación paraguaya,  para la elaboración de  dichos productos  para  seguir  con su actividad laboral. Ella con las capacitaciones constantes que recibe en las renovaciones se siente contenta y dispuesta en trabajar siempre.
Rosa es una persona muy sacrificada que quiere seguir ayudando a su familia, es por ello que pone todo lo mejor de sí.
texts.en:
The communal bank named San Cayetano is in it's sixth cycle. It is a large group where all of the women got together to be able to improve their lives through the trainings that they are receiving in the program offered by Fundacion Paraguaya.

One of the members of the group is Rosa. She is employed and also works selling cleaning products that she makes herself. She is asking for this loan in order to buy the microfranchise kit for cleaning that is offered by Fundacion Paraguaya, in order to produce said products and to continue with her work. She is happy with the regular trainings that she receives and is always ready to work.

Rosa is a very generous person who wants to continue helping her family, and it is for them that she gives her all.

loans.use: to buy cleaning kits to make cleaning products.

loans.name: Divina

texts.en:
Divina is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell for her rice business. Divina has been in this business for 10 years. Divina earns more income from farming sugar cane and from a general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business. Divina has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Joy

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Joy works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling personal care products in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling dried fish. Joy is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy more products like body lotion, perfume, soap, beauty kits, and other personal care products.

Joy has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more products like body lotion, perfume, soap, beauty kits, and other personal care products.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is a 57-year-old widow and has four children.

She is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. Editha requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Editha has been in this business for 10 years now, and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is 20 years old and single with one child presently in school. Judith works very hard to provide for them.

Judith runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, spices, bread, snack foods, and other personal care products.

Judith has been in this business for two years. In the future, Judith would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, spices, bread, snack foods, and other personal care products.

loans.name: Mamy Niaina

texts.fr:
36 ans, Mamy Niaina est mariée. Le couple a quatre enfants qui sont âgés de 6 à 13 ans et qui sont tous scolarisés dans une école chrétienne privée près de leur domicile.
L'époux de Mamy Niaina travaille en tant que chauffeur dans une société de distribution et pour l'aider à soutenir et entretenir le ménage et sa famille, elle dirige un magasin général. Elle démarrait ce magasin en 2008. Sa priorité en ce moment et le développement et l'extension de son activité, c'est pourquoi, elle demande un crédit. Tout ceci, pour qu'elle puisse offrir à ses enfants une meilleure éducation, et une meilleure condition de vie.
texts.en:
Mamy Niaina is 36 years old and married. She and her husband have four children aged 6 to 13 who are all enrolled in a private Christian school near their home.

Mamy Niaina's husband works as a chauffeur for a distribution company and, in order to help him support the household and their family, Mamy Niaina runs a general store. She started the store in 2008. At this time, her priority is to develop and expand this business, and that is why she is asking for a loan. She does all this so that she will be able to offer her children a better education and better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy staple goods and general merchandise such as soap, edible oil, concentrated milk, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz, de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, es madre soltera y vive con sus 2 hijos, ambos estudian y dependen económicamente de ella.  

Luz, se dedica a la venta de lociones y perfumes, ella trabaja en este negocio desde hace 2 años, una amiga la motivo y ella decidió empezar a trabajar de esa manera; ella trabaja todos los días proponiendo su producto casa por casa y lo hace en su comunidad y las comunidades vecinas.

Luz, necesita el préstamo para surtir su negocio y comprar diferentes tipos de lociones y nuevos productos que sus clientes le están pidiendo, porque tuvo problemas de salud con uno de sus hijos y se quedó sin capital para seguir trabajando.   

El sueño de Luz, es que sus hijos gocen de buena salud y que logren culminar sus estudios académicos con éxito y además que su negocio siga creciendo para poder generar los ingresos necesarios para su familia.
texts.en:
Luz, 37 years old, went to school through secondary school, is a single mother, and lives with her 2 children, they both go to school and depend on her economically.

Luz works selling lotions and perfumes. She has worked at this business for 2 years, a friend motivated her and she decided to begin to work in this way. She works every day promoting her products from house to house and she does it in her community and neighboring communities.

Luz needs the loan to stock her business and purchase different types of lotions and new products that her customers are requesting, because she had health problems with one of her children and was left with no capital to continue working.

Luz's dream is that her children enjoy good health and manage to finish their education successfully, and in addition that her business continues growing to be able to generate the income necessary for her family.

loans.use: to stock her business and purchase different types of lotions.

loans.name: Migdalia  Del Fatima

texts.es:
Migdalia es una honesta y emprendedora mujer de cuarenta y cinco años de edad,  ella se ha esforzado para convertirse en una buena comerciante, actualmente vende productos de limpieza para el hogar. Ella está muy agradecida con Kiva junto a MiCrédito, porque antes ya se le había beneficiado con un préstamo que le permitió surtirse y fortalecer su negocio. 
En estos momentos ha vuelto a tocar las puertas de estas organizaciones, esperando se le brinde la oportunidad mediante un financiamiento que planea utilizar para la compra de jabones liquidos, desinfectantes, detergentes, entre otros que su clientela está en constante demanda. En un futuro desea tener un vehículo para poder ofertar sus productos de forma ambulante.
texts.en:
Migdalia is an honest and enterprising woman, forty-five years old. She has worked hard to make herself into a good saleswoman, and currently sells household cleaning products. She is very grateful to Kiva and MiCrédito because she has already benefited from a loan before that allowed her to stock up and strengthen her business.

At this time, she has come back to knock on the door of these organizations, hoping that they offer her an opportunity through a loan that she plans to use to purchase liquid soaps, disinfectants, detergents and other products her customers are always requesting. In the future she wants to have a vehicle to be able to offer her products as a travelling salesperson.

loans.use: to purchase liquid soaps, disinfectants, detergents, and more.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to add to her inventory by buying 10 cases of soft drinks.

loans.name: Lesther Gabriel

texts.es:
Lesther, es un hombre de treinta y ocho años de edad, muy audaz y emprendedor, con el apoyo incondicional de su madre ha logrado salir adelante, mediante su negocio de pulpería, en el cual ha puesto su arduo trabajo. Está muy agradecido con MiCrédito y con Kiva, porque antes ambas organizaciones han confiado fielmente en él.
En estos momentos Lesther ha solicitado un préstamo, dado que confía fielmente en Kiva junto a MiCrédito, con este financiamiento planea comprar grandes cantidades de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, maíz, entre otros granos básicos. En un futuro planea hacer de su negocio una distribuidora de renombre.
texts.en:
Lesther is a man who is thirty-eight years old, very courageous and enterprising. With the unconditional support of his mother, he has managed to get ahead through his business of a general store, in which he has put his arduous work. He is very grateful to MiCrédito and Kiva because both organizations have faithfully trusted in him before.

At this time, Lesther has asked for a loan, given that he trusts faithfully in Kiva and MiCrédito. With this financing, he plans to purchase large quantities of rice, beans, sugar, corn and other basic grains. In the future he plans to make his business a recognized distributor.

loans.use: to purchase large quantities of rice, beans, sugar, corn, and other basic grains.

loans.name: Aniceto

texts.en: Aniceto is a 35-year-old married father of two children. He works hard to support his family. He is a policeman. Although the family works very hard, it can be difficult for him to afford the cost of his daughter's education. This loan of 1,000 USD will allow Aniceto to help his daughter continue her studies until she graduates from senior high school. He will use the loan to pay for registration, textbooks, and school supplies. In the future, Aniceto hopes that both of his children will be well-educated and knowledgeable.

loans.use: to pay for registration, textbooks, and school supplies.

loans.name: Gloria Marisol

texts.es: Gloria de estado civil casada, tiene 40 años de edad, con dos hijos, Pamela de once años que va a la escuela en su localidad y Cristian de 5 años de edad que todavía está en su casa, desde hace veinte años todos los días a partir de las cuatro y media de la mañana se levanta y se dirige al lugar que sencuentran sus vacas para luego ordeñarlas, luego esperar al comprador de la leche que le paga semanalmente, y así aporta al hogar, ya que no les alcanza con los ingresos de su esposo que trabaja de agricultor. Gloria necesita el dinero para comprar otra vaca lechera, ya que con el incremento de la producción de leche le ayudaría a su esposo a cubrir los gastos de alimentación y educación de sus hijos.
texts.en: Gloria is married, is 40 years old, and has two children, Pamela who is eleven and goes to the local school, and Cristian who is 5 and is still at home. For twenty years, she gets up every day at four thirty in the morning and goes to the place where her cows are kept to milk them, then she waits at the milk purchaser who pays weekly, and in this way she contributes to her household, since her husband's income from working in agriculture is not enough. Gloria needs the money to purchase another dairy cow since, with the increase in the milk production, she would help her husband cover the food and education expenses of their children.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge es estudiante de la Carrera Radiología, es muy dedicado al estudio un muchacho ejemplar que desea salir adelante con sus esfuerzos para alcanzar sus objetivos. 
Su meta es de tener su titulo y poder trabajar de forma independiente y como así también enseñar en las Universidades lo que aprendió, así  mejorar su calidad de vida y de su familia. 
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Jorge is a student in the radiology program. He is very dedicated to his studies and is a model young man who wants to get ahead with his efforts to achieve his objectives.

His goal is to have his degree and be able to work independently as well as to also teach at the universities what he learned, to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

He asks for this loan to be able to invest it in the payment of his program fees and, in this way, be able to continue with his education.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to add 15 planks to her inventory of construction materials.

loans.name: Juan Sebastian

texts.es: Juan tiene 19 años es soltero vive con sus padres que son de avanzada edad, es muy constante y trabajador compra terneros pequeños y todos los días se levanta muy temprano  a alimentarlos luego los deja en el campo y se va  a laborar como jornalero por el sector, en la tarde a su regreso  vuelve a cebarlos después de un tiempo cuando ya están grandes los vende. Juan requiere el crédito para  comprar más terneros, vacunas, balanceado, consiguiendo así mayor ganancia al vender ya que su deseo es mejorar las condiciones básicas de vida de él y sus padres.
texts.en: Juan is 19 years old, single, and lives with his parents who are elderly. He is very persevering and hard-working. He purchases young calves and every day he gets up very early to feed them, then he leaves them in the field and goes to work as a day laborer in the area. In the afternoon, when he comes back, he goes back to feed them. After a time, when they are grown, he sells them. Juan needs the loan to purchase more calves, vaccines, and balanced feed, in this way getting more earnings at the sale since his desire is to improve the basic living conditions for himself and his parents.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El comité se llama La Esperanza están en el primer ciclo con diecisiete integrantes,  todas son mujeres emprendedoras y con deseos de superación, es por ello que ponen su mayor esfuerzo.
Entre las integrantes se destaca a la Sra. Zara, por su emprendedurismo, ella se dedica a las ventas, cuenta con una despensa en su propia casa en donde ofrece todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad. Cada día va mejorando su negocio debido a que en ello pone siempre su mayor esfuerzo.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de bebidas, lácteos, panificados, y otros productos para poder seguir con sus ventas en su despensa como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The committee called La Esperanza is in its first loan cycle with seventeen members. They are all enterprising woman with desire to improve themselves, so they put their best effort into it. Among the members, Zara stands out for her entrepreneurial spirit. She works in sales and has a store in her own house where she sells all sorts of basic products. Every day she improves her business because she always puts her best effort into it.

She asks for this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of drinks, dairy products, baked goods, and other products to be able to continue with her sales in her store as she has been doing.

loans.use: to purchase drinks, dairy products, baked goods and other products.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with four children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks like rice, sugar, noodles, soap, etc. to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like farming sugarcane.

Elsa dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks like rice, sugar, noodles, soap, etc. to sell

loans.name: Jose Marcelino

texts.es:
José, de 40 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, muy orgulloso de saber leer y escribir y hasta sabe firmar, vive con su esposa quien se dedica también al comercio de jabón y detergentes, también vive con sus tres hijos que estudian en las escuela.- 

José, es un conocido comerciante de marisco en la zona donde vive, todos los días muy temprano saca su hielera y pone sus mariscos a disposición de todos sus clientes; la idea de vender mariscos de esa manera, surgió cuando vio a un señor vendiendo pescado en hielera en una comunidad vecina y fue entonces que a falta de trabajo decidió emprender ese mismo negocio.- José, aparte de ese negocio también cono acerca de la albañilería, pero ese trabajo está bastante escaso en su comunidad, hoy día su principal fuente de ingresos es la venta de marisco y la realiza todos los días en horarios de 7:00 a.m. hasta que termina su producto, regularmente termina a la 1:00 p.m.

José, necesita el dinero del préstamo para comprar mayores cantidades de mariscos y mejorar sus aperos de pesca (porque no son propios). Con el crédito podrá contar con más recursos y ampliar la variedad de mariscos, ofrecer más calidad a sus clientes y si fuera posible ampliar su área de distribución y comercialización.

José, sueña con comprar sus propios aperos de pesca y poder trabajar con su propio equipo, eso le permitiría generar mejores ganancias y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
José, 40 years old, went to school up to the sixth grade. He is very proud of knowing how to read and write, and he even knows how to sign his name. He lives with his wife who also works, at selling soap and detergents. He also lives with his three children who go to school.

José is a known shellfish vendor in the zone where he lives. Very early every day, he gets out his cooler and puts his shellfish at the disposal of all his customers. The idea of selling shellfish in this way came up when he saw a man selling fish in a cooler in a neighboring community and it was then that, with the lack of work, he decided to undertake this same business. José, apart from this business also knows masonry, but this work is rather scarce in his community. These days, his primary source of income is the sale of shellfish and he does it every day from 7:00 am until his product runs out, he regularly is done at 1:00 pm.

José needs the money from the loan to purchase greater quantities of shellfish and improve his fishing tools (since they are not his own). With the loan, he will be able to have more resources and expand the variety of shellfish, offer his customers more quality and if it is possible, to expand his distribution and sales area.

José dreams of purchasing his own fishing tools and being able to work with his own equipment, this would allow him to generate more earnings and improve his income.

loans.use: to purchase larger quantities of shellfish and improve his fishing tools (since they are not his own).

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with five children.

She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. and is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of feeds and rice bran.

She supplements this income with earnings from her general store.

Erlinda dreams that one day she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of feeds and rice bran.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
As a married mother of five children, Lolita works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Lolita is borrowing PHP 23,000 through NWTF in order to buy more sea foods to sell.

Lolita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 25 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more sea foods to sell.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is 59 years old and married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks like sardines, noodles, rice, etc. to sell.

Elena has borrowed and repaid 21 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks like sardines, noodles, and rice to sell.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Lourdes works hard to support her family.

She has an herbal medicine business in the Philippines and earns additional income from tricycle transportation. Lourdes is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to purchase more bottles of natural medicines to sell.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Lourdes has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more bottles of natural medicines to sell

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina is 50 years old, married, and has one child who is in school.

Marina is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Marina requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Marina has been raising pigs for four years now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Marina would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is 31 years old and married with two children who are still in school. Maricel works very hard to provide for them.

Maricel runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, bread, eggs, snack foods, and other personal care products.

Maricel has been in this business for 3 years.

In the future, Maricel would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, bread, eggs, snack foods, and other personal care products.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 38 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Evelyn is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Evelyn has been farming sugarcane for 5 years and also earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa is 33 years old and married with two children. Marissa works very hard to provide for them.

Marissa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, bread, eggs, snacks foods and other personal care products.

Marissa has been in this business for 4 years.

In the future Marissa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, bread, eggs, snacks foods and other personal care products

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is 46 years old and has three children. Marites is married and has two children are presently in school.

Marites is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Marites requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vaccine, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Marites has been in this business for 4 years now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Marites would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vaccine, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Mamita

texts.en:
Mamita is 65 years old, widowed, and has five children.

Mamita is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Mamita requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Mamita has been raising pigs for 16 years now, and has borrowed 28 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Mamita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Eden

texts.en:
Eden is 46 years old and married with two children.

She is in the agricultural business: pig fattening in the Philippines. Eden is borrowing PHP 8,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig.

Eden has been in this business for 3 years and also earns additional income from a beauty salon.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig.

loans.name: Rovena

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Rovena works hard to support her family.

She has a bicycle taxi business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Rovena is borrowing PHP 24,000 through NWTF to buy wheels and spare parts for her bicycle taxi business.

Rovena has been sustaining her business activities through her past 8 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy wheels and spare parts for her bicycle taxi.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 47 years old, widowed, and has seven children.

Jocelyn is in the agricultural business: raising pigs in the Philippines. Jocelyn requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Jocelyn has been in this business for 2 years now.

In the future, Jocelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Rosalita

texts.en:
Rosalita works hard to support her family. Rosalita is married and has a buy and sell rice business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

Rosalita has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Rosalita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Feresiana

texts.en:
Feresiana is a coffee trader located in Nyakanyinya, Bugongi, Bitereko. She is a married mother of 9 and only 3 are the only ones who are not school going. She is 39 years old and the only bread winner of her family, since her husband is incapacitated or crippled, so can help not much on this huge family.

She started this coffee trade business the day she got married to her husband in order to support her children that she would bear in her marriage. Apart from the coffee trade business she also owns a sugar cane plantation where she makes juice that later turns into local brew or enguli that she sells to supplement her finances. Most of her clients are people around her area and all walks of life people. Her main challenge in this business is bad weather and poor road network to her home area.

She hopes to educate her children into better people in the future since they will be the ones to support her and her husband in their old age. She is a hardworking woman as she describes herself and asks UGAFODE to keep in business and help local women Improve their finances with the financial literacy it brings close to them.
She will use the loan funds to pay tuition for her children.

loans.use: To pay tuition for her children

loans.name: Tol's Group

texts.en: Tol’s group live in a rural village in Phnom Penh city in Cambodia. Tol makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as seller to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.	.

loans.name: Leydi Xiomara

texts.es:
Leydi, de 29 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, vive en la casa con sus padres y 2 hermanas.  

Leydi, se dedica a atender en una tienda que posee desde hace 3 años, decidió dedicarse a vender estos productos porque quedó desempleada después de un recorte de personal en donde trabajaba anteriormente, la tienda la tiene en su casa y el horario de atención es de 6:00 a.m. a 6:00 p.m.
  
Leydi, necesita el dinero para surtir más la tienda y comprar productos de la canasta básica para vender.

Los sueños de Leydi, son poder ampliar más la tienda y colocar otro negocio de lácteos.
texts.en:
Leydi is 29 years old, has studied up to the ninth grade, and lives at home with her parents and two sisters.

Leydi works running a store that she has had for three years. She decided to work selling these products because she became unemployed after a lay off at her previous place of employment. The store is in her home and it is open from 6:00 AM to 6:00 PM.

Leydi needs money to further stock her store and buy staple food products to sell. Leydi's dreams are to be able to expand her store and start another business selling dairy products.

loans.use: to further stock her store and buy staple food products to sell.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.en: Francisco is a 49-year-old married father of four children who works hard to support his family. He is a teacher. Even though the family works very hard, it can be not enough for them to afford the cost of his education. This loan of $ 1,000 will allow Francisco to continue his study in the University. He will use the loan to pay for registration and materials for school; he hopes that further education will help him to have a brighter future.

loans.use: to pay for registration and materials for school.

loans.name: Alexandra

texts.es:
Alexandra vive en la ciudad de Itá con sus padres y su hermano es estudiante de la carrera de Contabilidad, a la par que estudia está trabajando para poder cumplir con sus metas.
Tiene como objetivo culminar la carrera en 4 años y seguir son sus estudios, además desea ejercer como profesional y buscar otro trabajo para solventar ella misma sus gastos y tener un hogar propio
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Alexandra lives with her parents and brother in the city of Itá. She is studying for a degree in Accounting. In addition to attending school, she is working in order to accomplish her goals. Alexandra wants to finish her degree in four years and then continue with her studies. She would also like to become a practicing professional and find another job that will allow her to pay her expenses and have a home of her own.

Alexandra is requesting this loan so that she can invest in her degree fees. This would allow her to continue studying just as before.

loans.use: to pay her degree fees.

loans.name: Jerber Salvador

texts.es: Jerber de 24 años de edad, vive al lado de su madre y de su hermano. Jerber es un joven emprendedor que se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos. Actividad que realiza para poder ayudar a cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia y así también para ir buscando una mejor forma de vida. Jerber es una persona humilde, que se preocupa por su familia, por lo que decide solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: bloques, hierro, cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra para la construcción de un muro de contención, ya que anteriormente solicito un crédito el cual utilizo para iniciar con el muro como se observa en la fotografía, por lo que con el nuevo continuara construyendo para seguir mejorando su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jerber is 24 years old and lives next door to his mother and brother. Jerber is a young entrepreneur who works raising and selling chickens which he does in order to help cover the basic needs of his family and to also search for a better way of life.

Jerber is a humble person who cares about his family. For this reason he has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in: cinder blocks, iron, cement, sand and to pay labor costs for the construction of a retaining wall since he previously received a loan which he used to start building the wall, as can be seen in the photograph. With the new loan he will continue to build in order to continue improving his quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in cinder blocks, iron, cement, sand and to pay labor costs for the construction of a retaining wall.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is 44 years old and has seven children. Lydia is married and four of her children are currently in school.

Lydia is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Lydia requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Lydia has been in this business for four years now.

In the future, Lydia would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Rosela

texts.en:
Rosela is 61 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. Rosela is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Rosela has been pig fattening for 25 years and earns additional income from farming rice.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Carmelina

texts.en:
As a widowed parent of six children, Carmelina works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from dried fish processing. Carmelina is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to purchase additional fishing nets and other materials for her fishing business.

Carmelina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 2 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing nets and other materials.

loans.name: Vanthy's Group

texts.en: Vanthy’s group live in a rural village in Phnom Penh city in Cambodia. Vanthy makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as factory laborer and teacher to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Sofia Elvira

texts.es: Sofía es una  emprendedora Barranquillera de 56 años, dedicada a la confección de todo tipo de  prendas de vestir; pantalones, camisas, vestidos para damas, ropa deportiva, uniformes de acuerdo a los requerimientos de sus clientes. Ella enviudó muy joven y enfrentaba la responsabilidad de su hogar y la educación de sus 4 hijos, en vista de estas circunstancias con la ayuda de sus familiares recibió capacitación  en el arte de las confecciones en el Centro Institucional del Distrito e inició su propio taller en el que cuenta con 20 años de experiencia.  Sofía tiene sus clientes fijos entre amigos, vecinos, familiares y algunos colegios con quien contrata la elaboración de uniformes, actualmente está tramitando su primer creditkiva a través de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, financiamiento que planea invertir en telas e insumos para preparar un inventario de productos terminados que ofrecer a su clientela para la temporada de fin de año.  Esta emprendedora se proyecta hacia  el futuro, con un almacén, donde pueda brindarle  a los clientes lo mejor con estrategias definidas en cuanto a precios, calidad y otros aspectos  que el cliente prefiere siempre: Un buen servicio que es lo más gratificante.
texts.en:
Sofía is a 56 year old, entrepreneurial Barranquilla woman. She works making all types of clothing: pants, shirts, women's dresses, workout clothes and uniforms, based on her customers requirements. She was widowed at a very young age, and faced with the responsibilities of her home and caring for her 4 children. In light of these circumstances, with the help of her family, she received training in the art of creating clothes in the Institutional Center of her district. She opened her own shop in which she now has over 20 years experience. Sofía has regular customers through her friends, neighbors, family members, and some colleagues with whom she makes uniforms on a contract basis.

She is seeking her first Kiva loan through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She plans to invest the proceeds in fabrics and supplies in order to prepare an inventory of finished products she can offer to her customers for the end of the year season. This entrepreneur looks ahead to a future with a storage area, where she can offer her customers the best, with defined strategies as to price, quality and other aspects that the customers always prefer, such as good service which is the most gratifying.

loans.use: to invest in fabrics and supplies.

loans.name: Rolando Amilcar

texts.es: Rolando de 31 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y su hija de 5 años de edad. Él es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida brindando sus servicios como empleado en una lechería siendo así como genera sus ingresos económicos con los que brinda lo necesario para su familia. Rolando desea realizar unas mejoras a su vivienda como en cementar las paredes realizar reparaciones en el techo así brindarles mayor comodidad a su familia es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, láminas, polines, para el mejoramiento de su vivienda y brindar mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en: Rolando is 31 years old and lives in a home he owns together with his life partner and his five year old daughter.  He is a hardworking man who earns a living providing his services as an employee of a dairy.  His income provides everything necessary for his family.  Rolando wants to make some improvements to his home, including cementing the walls and repairing the roof to provide his family with more comfort.  He is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, metal sheeting, and beams to improve his home and provide more comfort for his family.

loans.use: to invest in cement, metal sheeting, and beams to improve his home and provide his family with more comfort.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is 27 years old and has four children. Marites is married and three of her children are presenlty in school.

Marites is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. Marites requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Marites has been in this business for one year now.

In the future, Marites would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Jeffrey Wilson

texts.es:
Jeffrey creció bajo el ejemplo de libros de leyes, firmas y padres quienes se movían bajo el mundo de la abogacía y notaria, lo que le llamó la atención e iba aprendiendo desde pequeño sobre este mundo, que más adelante se volvió en su objetivo de estudio. Ahora está a punto de salir de la licenciatura en Derecho a sus 22 años de edad, pues la considera como una amplitud de conocimientos un perfil muy importante en la sociedad.
Este joven es caracterizado por su positivismo y por uno de los mejores de su clase, por lo que siempre está pendiente de dar lo mejor de sí. Jeffrey cuenta con el apoyo de sus dos padres, por lo que para él fue fácil tomar la decisión de solicitar un préstamo para comprar una computadora y una impresora, herramientas necesarias para reforzar su aprendizaje e iniciar la redacción y almacenamiento de la información para su monografía. En sus planes está independizarse de sus padres y ejercer la carrera de Derecho en el litigio o en el campo académico.
texts.en:
Jeffrey grew up with the example of law books, signatures, and parents who moved in the world of lawyers and notaries. This caught his attention and he learned from a young age about that world, which later became the goal of his studies. Now he's 22 years old and about to receive his law degree, which he considers a breadth of knowledge, a very important profile in society.

This young man is characterized by his optimism and for being one of the best in his class. He is always willing to give his best. Jeffrey has the support of his parents which made it easy for him to make the decision to request a loan to buy a computer and a printer. These are necessary tools to strengthen his studies and to start writing and storing data for his thesis.

Among his plans are becoming independent from his parents and practicing the field of law in litigation or education.

loans.use: to buy a computer and a printer

loans.name: Elsi Nohemi

texts.es:
Elsi, de 41 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, tiene 6 hijos de los cuales 5 ya no viven con ella, solo la última hija es la que vive en la casa y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y horticultura.

Elsi, se dedica a cultivar granos básicos como maíz y frijol, se ha dedicado a este rubro desde hace 20 años, lo aprendió de sus padres y anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de pescado, está a medio kilómetro de su casa y viaja a su lugar de trabajo a pie y se involucra su esposo, su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 a.m. a 1:00 p.m.
  
Elsi, necesita el préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas para los cultivos tales como fungicidas, fertilizantes y foliares. 

Los sueños de Elsi, son poder comprar el terreno donde están trabajando, porque lo están alquilando.
texts.en:
Elsi is 41 years old, studied up to the third grade, and has six children, five of which no longer live with her. Only her youngest daughter lives in her home. Her husband works in agriculture and horticulture.

Elsi works growing basic grains such as corn and beans. She has worked in this field, which she learned from her parents, for 20 years. Previously, she worked selling fish. Her place of work is half a kilometer from her home and she travels to work on foot. Her husband is also involved. Her work schedule is from 6:00 AM to 1:00 PM.

Elsi needs the loan to purchase agricultural supplies for her crops such as fungicides, fertilizers and liquid plant fertilizers. Elsi's dreams are to be able to purchase the land where they are working because they are renting it.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for crops such as fungicides, fertilizers and liquid plant fertilizers.

loans.name: Francisco Osmedo

texts.es: Francisco de 24 años de edad, vive al lado de su compañera de vida y al lado de su hijo de 11 año 2 meses de edad. Él es un hombre trabajador y responsable que para poder llevar el sustento diario a su familia labora en una empresa de construcción, en la cual tiene 2 años de ejercer el puesto  Francisco en busca de mejorar su condición de vida decide solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: bloques, cemento, arena, hierro y pago de mano de obra para la construcción de una pequeña vivienda para ofrecerle una mejor vida a su esposa y a su pequeño hijo, ya que su mayor sueño es tener un lugar propio en el cual vivir.
texts.en:
Francisco is 24 years old. He lives with his life partner and their 13 month old son. He is a hard working and responsible man. In order to meet his household expenses he has worked in a construction business for 2 years.

Searching to better the conditions of his life, Francisco decided to seek a loan from FUSAI to invest in cinder blocks, cement, sand, iron and labor to build a small house, to offer a better life to his wife and their small child. His greatest dream is to have his own place in which to live.

loans.use: to invest in cinder blocks, cement, sand, iron and labor for the construction of a small house.

loans.name: Irvin Adilson

texts.es: Irvin de 19 años de edad vive al lado de su compañera de vida, vive en casa de su madre. Irvin posee un negocio de venta de tortas ambulantes, negocio con el cual obtiene los ingresos necesarios para mantener la economía del hogar y así de esta manera poder vivir de una mejor manera al lado de su esposa. Irvin en busca de mejorar su calidad de vida solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: ladrillos, hierro, arena, cemento, láminas y pago de mano de obra para la construcción de una pequeña vivienda, en la cual Irvin desea brindar una mejor comodidad y por consiguiente una mejor forma de vida a su esposa.
texts.en:
Irvin is 19 years old and lives with his life partner in his mother's house. Irvin has a business selling tortas (sandwiches) as a street vendor. From his business he makes enough income to maintain his home, allowing him to live in a better manner with his wife.

Searching to improve his quality of life, Irvin seeks a loan from FUSAI to invest in bricks, iron, sand, cement, laminate sheeting and labor for the construction of a small house, in which Irvin hopes to offer more comfort, and therefore a better life to his wife.

loans.use: to invest in bricks, iron, sand, cement, laminate sheeting and labor for the construction of a small house.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia is a married woman who is 58 years old with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 50,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish net, gasoline for her boat, bamboo, and other materials for her business.

Sonia has been in this business for 30 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fish net, gasoline for her boat, bamboo, and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Febe

texts.en:
Febe is 42 years old and married with two children. With both children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Febe has been in this business for twenty years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, spices, and other groceries.

In the future she would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Yolorica

texts.en:
Yolorica is a married woman who is 50 years old with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Yolorica has been in this business for five years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with five children.

She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines. and is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of fertilizers.

She supplements this income with earnings from her buy and sell rice business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Ruth dreams that one day she will be able to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of fertilizers

loans.name: Manuela

texts.en:
Manuela is 55 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items of groceries to sell, like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, bread, eggs, snacks foods, and personal care products.

Manuela has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, bread, eggs, snacks foods, and personal care products.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is 56 years old and married with eight children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks like sardines, soft drinks, soap, etc., to sell.

Rosemarie has been in this business for ten years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks like sardines, soft drinks, soap, etc., to sell.

loans.name: Ferly Jane

texts.en:
Ferly Jane is 34 years old and widowed, with two children, both of whom are in school.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell to customers.

Ferly Jane has borrowed and paid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for seven years and also earns an income from farming rice.

She aspires to save enough money so she continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell to customers.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is 52 years old and has seven children. She is married and has one child still in school.

She is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig.

Rosemarie has been in this business for 10 years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig

loans.name: Segundo Artenio

texts.es:
Segundo, es un hombre de cincuenta y seis años de edad, carismático y positivo, él trabaja junto a sus cuatro hijos en su taller de pintura y enderezado automotriz, negocio familiar que ha logrado sacar adelante a base de trabajo en equipo. Él está muy agradecido con Kiva junto a MiCrédito, por las experiencias con financiamientos que le han brindado ambas organizaciones. 
En estos momentos, ha vuelto a recurrir a un préstamo, que planea invertir en la compra de productos de pintura para carros al por mayor, dado que esto les garantiza a sus clientes un servicio rápido y de calidad. Poco a poco él va saliendo adelante, su  sueño es hacer de su taller uno de los más importantes de su ciudad.
texts.en:
Segundo is a charismatic and positive, 56 year old man. He works with his four children in a automotive paint and body shop. It is a family business that has succeeded due to teamwork.

He is very grateful to Kiva and MiCrédito, for the financing experiences both organizations have provided him. At this moment, he has returned for a loan, which he plans to invest in the purchase of wholesale paint products for cars, as this will guarantee quick, quality service for his customers. Little by little he is getting ahead. His dream is to make his shop one of the most important in the city.

loans.use: to buy wholesale paint products for cars.

loans.name: Paridiso Group

texts.fr: Malisawa est commerçante, présidente du groupe de crédits «Paridiso», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée à un chauffeur, âgée de 45 ans, mère de 3 enfants tous étudient. Elle est vendeuse des produits de tressages cheveux et de beautés au domicile dans une avenue de la ville depuis 5 ans. Elle va acheter 28 pièces de mèches et des huiles de beautés. Elle souhaite accroitre son activité, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables. Nous tenons à signaler q'une client porte son bébé.
texts.en: Malisawa is a businesswoman, president of the Paridiso credit group and a member of Hekima. She is 45 years old, married to a driver, and has three children all of whom she sends to school. She has been selling hair plaiting products and beauty products from her home on an avenue in the town for five years. She intends to buy 28 hair locks and cosmetic oils. She hopes to expand her business and send her children to school and feed them. Finally, she thanks Hekima for their support for non-bankable entrepreneurs. It should be noted that this client is carrying her baby.

loans.use: to buy 28 plaits and cosmetic oils.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is 31 years old, married, and has two children, with one child still in school.

She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, vaccine, and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Rowena has been in this business for two years now, and has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, vaccine, and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 37 years old and married with four children. With two children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 24,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Evelyn has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as soap, sugar, canned goods, and other groceries. In the future Evelyn would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Saholiniaina Véronique

texts.fr:
3 ans, Véronique est mariée et son mari est pâtissier salarié dans une boulangerie. Le couple a deux enfants  de 6 mois et 5 ans donc l'ainé seulement est scolarisé actuellement.
Elle exerce depuis 2009 une activité de vente de services téléphoniques  (taxi-phone), des téléphones portables et des accessoires. Elle démarrait seulement avec la vente des recharges et des mobiles. Puis l'activité se développe petit à petit . Avant 2009 même, elle pratiquait une activité de vente des snacks en s'associant avec une amie. Son souhait est de pouvoir ouvrir une boutique suivant le norme un jour.
